mapper.select: select c.id,c.title,c.cover,c.lesson_num AS lessonNum,CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price,t.name,cd.description,s1.title levelOne,s2.title levelTwo from edu_course c left outer join edu_course_description cd on c.id=cd.id left outer join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id=t.id left outer join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id=s2.id left outer join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id=s1.id where c.id=#{id};
